New Records: Jared McCain scored 23 points, his highest in the Emirates NBA Cup opener
Pre-Game Insights: Tyrese Maxey was out with a right hamstring injury, leading to Jared McCain's increased role
Post-Match Reflections: Jared McCain expressed confidence in his ability to handle more minutes and defensive responsibilities
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks won the game with a final score of 111-99, highlighting their depth with multiple players scoring in double figures
Others: The game was part of the 2024 Emirates NBA Cup, showcasing the teams' preparations for the upcoming season
